DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare pharmacokinetics single oral administration rosuvastatin valsartan separately versus coadministration rosuvastatin valsartan healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Rosuvastatin Valsartan
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 20 year 50 year Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19kg/m2 27kg/m2 inclusive Eligible subject acceptable medical history , physical examination laboratory test , ECG screen period Able follow instruction participate whole procedure trial Have sign write informed consent voluntary , prior procedure , use form approve local Institutional Review Board detail explanation drug Anticipate adult female sexual partner , possibility pregnant breastfeed take step prevent conception study Have history cardiovascular disorder ( congestive heart failure , disorder ( diabetic , impair glucose tolerance etc . ) , digestive system disorder , central nervous system disorder , mental illness malignant tumor Have history gastrointestinal disease ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer etc . ) , gastrointestinal surgery ( simple appendectomy herniotomy exclude ) affect absorption drug Have suffer clinically significant disease within 30 day prior first administration Have know hypersensitivity history clinically significant hypersensitivity drug include class drug rosuvastatin valsartan , drug ( aspirin , antibiotic etc . ) Have genetic myopathy , family history myopathy , history myopathy drug Have systolic blood pressure high 150mmHg low 90mmHg , diastolic blood pressure high 100mmHg low 60mmHg , pulse rate 100times/min less 40times/min Have history drug abuse show positive drug abuse drug screen test Participated clinical trial within 90 day prior first administration Have use herbal medicine , prescription drug , generic medicine within 30 day , 14
